message.body: Are you avoiding me? You said you wanted to be a friend Martha.
Nope just really busy and was asleep when you called. The guilt doesn't work so well on me.
That's for sure. Not trying to guilt, just trying to understand.
Do you have any desire to talk?
Not at this moment, catching some z's when I can. But yes I do have the desire
Me too. Sorry to interrupt. Hope you're well
Same to you, cowboy. Sorry to hear about your Philly internship
